sectionOnlineProgram.title: Turn your dream into a degree
sectionOnlineProgram.text: Your goals to create a better life – for your family, your community, the world – are within your reach. As an online student, you’ll learn from the same faculty and follow the same curriculum as on-campus students, providing you with industry connections, research opportunities, internships and career services.
sectionOnlineProgram.subText: *Survey of ASU alumni who earned their degree online between 2018-2021

facts.text: programs for nearly every career path and passion
of online alumni reported earning their degree led to their first career job, a new job or promotion
